title: Chat clubs still down
body:
I won't rant. All I want is a little more information than just "We are aware of issues with Clubs, and are working on a fix." Why is Riot having such a hard time fixing this? I run a fairly large chat club at 36 members and growing. This club is invaluable in keeping us all connected and always providing a list of friends to play ranked with. It also consistently requires friendship, cooperation, and a non-toxic environment for all members.

It's been a week and chat clubs aren't fixed. Can you please give me some kind of status update on this. I've been playing League for almost 5 years, and you guys at Riot usually fix things pretty quickly. I'm just wondering.

Thanks.

replies.body:
I can't provide any additional information other than we actually are working on a fix and will deploy it as soon as it's ready. 

I hope that works as an answer for now. Let me know if you have any other issues I can assist you with.

thank you for the update

I know you guys feel awkward giving updates when you feel you have nothing to update but even a "we still working on it" every couple of days helps 

1 week solid of nothing just makes it feel like you've forgotten (even though rationally we know thats not true) or ignoring the problem
Is there any chance that I will lose my club tag? I am currently the owner of Waifu on the NA server and I want to know If I will have to try to re-register the club tag when they return.
They fixed it! they loaded up just fine this morning! thanks Riot!
It's coming up on two weeks of down time for clubs. A rewind would be nice.

I'm going to guess and assume there's an issue with sharing Clubs with the soon to be released Alpha Client?.... it is just a guess, but they sure have been down a really long time. The timing aligned with the Alpha testing clubs in Riots announcement. I could be off a few days :P{{champion:245}}  maybe he can rewind?
